(a)
               

               Amendments to any of the provisions of this Code shall be made by amending such provisions
               by specific reference to the section number of this Code in the following language:
               "That section _____ of the Code of Ordinances, Buncombe County, North Carolina, is
               hereby amended to read as follows:â€¦." The new provisions shall then be set out in
               full as desired.
               

               (b)
               

               If a new section not heretofore existing in the Code is to be added, the following
               language shall be used: "That the Code of Ordinances, Buncombe County, North Carolina,
               is hereby amended by adding a section, to be numbered _____, which section reads as
               follows:â€¦." The new section shall then be set out in full as desired.
